website_summaries.verdict: A fun, easy-to-articulate, posable mech figure with plenty of accessories and LEGO characters to keep kids occupied for hours.
pros: Lots of figures and accessories included with this LEGO set, including an exclusive Ronin figure
Kids have fun building and playing with this kit
Highly posable robot figure has its own detachable skateboard, adding to the fun factor
cons: Robot’s arms sit awkwardly at the shoulder joint, so some users have reversed them so they articulate more naturally

customer_reviews.title: Your child will love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons 8th birthday because he is obsessed with ninjago and really thought this set was very cool. Instructions were good and he built the whole set with minimal help. I would definitely recommend this set. If your child is 6 or younger they would most likely need help building it just because there are quite a few parts.
customer_reviews.author: Reanna C

customer_reviews.title: Good set for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: Good set for my nephew. We built this in a short time. He liked this "MEC" better than the Nexo Knights one he himself bought. He said this was one of his favorites so far. I think he likes the Ninjago theme better as he watches the TV show.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ronin is both bad and good so you decide how his Mech fits in Ninjago!
customer_reviews.text: Great set, lots of playability. Great build, lots of sub systems to Mech, plus the skeleton mech.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if you can find it on sale.
customer_reviews.text: The Salvage Mech is great and was a fun build. I didn't bother with the small skeleton mech thing. It's silly and doesn't even look good. It's a good set if you can catch it on sale. The only thing that bothered me on the Salvage Mech are the arms. There are black sloped pieces on the armpit area of the arm that, as built, prevent the arms from going down all the way and restrict the movement. I turned them around so they sloped toward the armpit and was much happier with the look and function of it. The skeletons are kind of pointless in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Babe

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to get this on Prime day for less than half price! Granson will be thrilled this Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Kittypaws63

customer_reviews.title: Fun to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves the Ninja lego Set because it’s a lot of pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Nana23a

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and had a great time building and tinkering with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bina E.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This was fantastic, great for children 8 to 15 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my grandson. He and his friends love playing with these sets.
customer_reviews.author: River GRITS

customer_reviews.title: COol
customer_reviews.text: Really cool set. The mec guy is cool and comes with dem cool skeletons, yeah
customer_reviews.author: Ellison Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the product as it agreed to the description, and I received it on time.
customer_reviews.author: Rossie

customer_reviews.title: Really Differnt but Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool toy. Son is 10 and loved it. He said it was totally different than other lego mechs bc it was a robot but made out junkyard stuff.
customer_reviews.author: SARA

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew. There were a few pieces missing on the set, so we couldn't build the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: MomX3

customer_reviews.title: My five year old loved this and was able to put it together with ...
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loved this and was able to put it together with little help. He's really into legos, so if you are buying as a first kit follow the age guidelines.
customer_reviews.author: Realtoradam

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Lego set. This was purchased for a granddaughter who requested it. She loved it and started to play as soon as she got it.
customer_reviews.author: grandma pat

customer_reviews.title: ... think this mech was going to turn out as cool as it did but in the end
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this mech was going to turn out as cool as it did but in the end, it is one of my favorite mech builds from lego. The only other mech type build I liked better than this was the Exo Suit kit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the amount of pieces involved
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this set. He quickly put it together on his own and has been playing with it nonstop. Great price for the amount of pieces involved. (I paid $28)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. He absolutely loved it! All the pieces are accounted for. He's had it opened for 7 hours now and already has most of it put together. Its a cool set. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: This was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a six-year old's birthday. He was thrilled. Didn't take him long to get it together.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Posable Robot
customer_reviews.text: I'm a collector of figures from various TV shows, books, and comics, and this looked like a high-quality, well-designed robot. I was not disappointed. The robot is very posable. The joints are the best I've seen out of any figures - you want them to move, but then stick in position. This it does perfectly. I was into Legos as a kid in the 80s, and I built lots of ships, robots, and transformers. These pieces they make now are so fantastic - ideally suited to the job with a great deal of style and potential. The Lego company has have never let me down, and all these years later are better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Shambalagala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves putting them together easy to follow directions
customer_reviews.author: mary jo miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The seven year-old who received enjoyed building it and playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Crazy fun putting this one together with Lil man. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Uribe

product_meta.title: LEGO Ninjago 70592 Salvage M.E.C. Building Kit (439 Piece)
product_meta.description:
Place Ronin in the opening cockpit of his mech and get ready for battle. With powerful weapons and a special compartment for storing stolen items, it's the ultimate bounty hunting machine. Fire the golden bow's spring-loaded shooter and dodge the Skulkin mech's attacks with its silver dark blades. Unleash the net-stud shooter to trap the Skulkin warriors and then detach the skateboard or flyer to escape with the loot! This all-action toy for boys and girls includes 4 minifigures.

BRAND STORY
By LEGO Ninjago
feature_bullets: Build an awesome, poseable Salvage M.E.C. mech with a spring-loaded shooter, a golden bow, and an opening minifigure cockpit
Includes four minifigures featuring Ronin with special M.E.C. outfit, Nya with special Sky Bound outfit, plus Krazi and Frakjaw
Ronin's flyer measures over 1" high, 3" long and 2" wide. Skulkin mech measures over 3" high, 1" long and 1" wide
LEGO NINJAGO building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Featured in the hit TV series LEGO NINJAGO: Masters of Spinjitzu.
439 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14 years old

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
